title: The “ Mints”
body_html:
This big plush sneaker slipper color-way is one of the most SPICY and HIGH DEMAND plush sneaker yet! Our sneaker slippers are one-size fits-most (US 4 to 13). You WILL NOT regret buying these cozy comfortable sneakers slippers that look like shoes! Our sneaker slippers plush are designed with a special material that hugs to your feet which makes them ONE SIZE FITS ALL!

 

Our slippers are designed with a special material that hugs to your feet which makes them ONE SIZE FITS ALL!
